body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have two white creatures on the battlefield.
2. Equip one with Livewire Lash and the other with Sword of Light and Shadow.
3. Target the Lash-equipped creature with a spell. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Since Livewire Lash grants a damage-dealing ability to the creature it equips rather than dealing damage itself, the Sword-equipped creature should not be a valid target (it has protection from white, and the creature is the damage source). Instead, it is a valid target but the damage is prevented. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.23, OS X
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: The ability granted by Livewire Lash doesn't obey protection-based targeting restrictions
